metadata.title: CVE-2019-13710 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in downloads in Google Chromeprior to 78.0.3904.70 allowed a remote attacker to bypass downloadrestrictions via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
